SELECT c.merchant, c.name as mname, c.phonenum as phone, c.email, c.telephonenum, c.weixin FROM contacts c where c.access_node_id in( select s.access_node_id from (SELECT c.id, c.token, c.ipaddr, c.access_mac, c.used_on, c.expired_on, c.mac, c.incoming, c.outgoing, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.access_node_id, c.device,c.portal_url,c.phonenum, ad.province,ad.city,ad.district FROM connections c left join addresses ad on c.access_node_id = ad.access_node_id) s left join contacts f on s.access_node_id = f.access_node_id
s.used_on <= now() and s.expired_on > now()
s.access_mac like "%$mac$%"
s.province=#pcode#
s.id=#id#
)

select s.id, s.used_on, s.expired_on, s.mac, s.incoming, s.outgoing, s.created_at, s.updated_at, s.access_node_id, s.device, s.portal_url, s.province, s.city, s.access_mac, s.district, f.merchant, f.name AS mname, f.phonenum as phone, f.email, f.telephonenum, f.weixin, f.id as fid from (SELECT c.id, c.token, c.ipaddr, c.access_mac, c.used_on, c.expired_on, c.mac, c.incoming, c.outgoing, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.access_node_id, c.device,c.portal_url,c.phonenum, ad.province,ad.city,ad.district,an.belong_type FROM connections c left join addresses ad on c.access_node_id = ad.access_node_id left join access_nodes an on an.id= c.access_node_id) s left join contacts f on s.access_node_id = f.access_node_id
s.used_on <= now() and s.expired_on > now()
s.access_mac like "%$mac$%"
s.province=#pcode#
order by s.used_on DESC

select * from ap_customer_count where 1=1 and to_days(now())-to_days(date)=1
province=#province#
city=#city#
district=#district#
time_interval=#timeInterval#
order by online_num desc limit #rank#
select * from ap_customer_count where ap_mac=#mac# and to_days(now())-to_days(date)=1
